Fuel.question: What types of fuel are approved and what is the fuel density?
Fuel.answer: Aviation Grade 100 LL (Blue) or 100 (Green) (6.01 lb/gal or 0.72 kg/L)

Engine.answer: Contential TSIO-550-K Fuel Injected Air Cooled - 315 bhp

General Operating Limitations.question: What is the never exceed speed (VNE)?
General Operating Limitations.answer: VMO – 205 KIAS up to 17,500ft and 175 KIAS up to 25,000ft

General Operating Limitations.question: What is the maximum structural cruising speed (VRO)?
General Operating Limitations.answer: VNO – 175 KIAS up to 17,500ft and 150 KIAS up to 25,000ft

AFCS.question: What is the minimum autopilot speed?
What is the minimum autopilot engagement altitude?
At what altitude should autopilot be disconnected for visual approach?
AFCS.answer: 1000' AGL – Disconnect altitude for visual approach

AFCS.question: When should autopilot be disconnected on an instrument approach?
AFCS.answer: Minimums – 200ft AGL or min disconnect altitude on IAP on GP or GS Mode

Icing.question: What is the total usable TKS fluid quantity?
What is the minimum TKS fluid quantity for dispatch?
What is the minimum airspeed in icing conditions?
What is the maximum Anti-Ice System operation?
Icing.answer: 177 KIAS – Max airspeed Anti-Ice System operation

Icing.question: What is the maximum flap setting in icing conditions?
Icing.answer: 50% Flaps – Max deflection with ice accretion

Icing.question: What is the minimum operating temperature for the Anti-Ice System?
Icing.answer: -30°F/-34°C – Min operating temperature for the Anti-Ice System
